name: Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad
description:
Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad is an action-shooter game developed by Tripwire Interactive. It came out on 13-09-2011. It was published by 1C Company. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad is available on PC.
Sam Hulick scored the game.
